Nightshift grins with satisfaction.

" Nine lives instead of four tires, go=
tta love it.  Oh yeah, definitely what I wanted.  A bit of swagger and a lo=
tta cattitude . "

He leaps gracefully onto a chair and takes a seat.  His =
expressions twice as playful and vibrant than before.  

" So, got a game p=
lan for us, huh?"

Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for=
 things you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.=


On Nov 7, 2011, at 2:20 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrot=
e:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Now resting comfortably, Nightshift comically wakes h=
imself up while purring
> > in his sleep. He rolls over onto his stomach an=
d reads the message. A
> > reflection on the screen shows a pair of cat lik=
e eyes and a muzzle full of
> > whiskers. He then looks at a pair of large =
black paws with thick paw pads.
> >
> > " Sweet, that wasn't a dream after =
all. He did it, Holy Slag, he did it."
> >
> > He gets up on his paws and c=
limbs down off the bench. Slowly he skulks into
> > the room where he had b=
een instructed to go. He quietly pads up behind Lord
> > Elder and puts a g=
entile paw on his shoulder.
> >
> > " Guess who."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> ELDER tur=
ned as NIGHTSHIFT came into the room, "Ah, I see you were
> able to get you=
r new beast mode." The smile on his face a bit forced
> as if he had much o=
n his mind but was still making an effort to be
> civil, "Is it to your lik=
ing?"
> 
> As ELDER spoke others were filing into the room as well. POLAR C=
LAW,
> RAMULUS, WOLFGANG and PROWL all of them looking as good as new after=

> that recent battle with the DINOBOTS.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>
